formattedAddress: 2 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
This is a pretty good fish spot. I especially liked the location on the east side many moons ago. The food was absolutely amazing. Today, it was alright.  Perhaps it's my taste buds of late. Also, like any other food spot, it depends on whose cooking in the back and the day of the week üòâ. Nonetheless, I recommend this place-serving fried fish/seafood with an assortment of "soul food"sides.  Collards,candied yams, potato salad,Mac&Cheese, etc..

It's nice to see that they're still in business after 3 decades or so. ü¶ûüêüüç§

I was a wee bit annoyed about my cake. I ordered coconut & received chocolate.  It was good, thoughüç∞

originalText.text: The shrimp are severely over cooked, the potato salad is too sweet & the Mac & cheese taste like it‚Äôs boxed. Then they have the nerve to give you tartar sauce in packets. I will never go back to this establishment. This food is inedible & have the audacity to charge $24 for this disaster. Don‚Äôt waste your money here. Next time go to Sugar Hill Fish Place, that‚Äôs where I would have went but they‚Äôre closed on Sundays.

originalText.text: I visited this location in early September 2022.  I‚Äôm glad they reopened on 125th.   Whenever I‚Äôm in the mood some fried whiting this is the place to go.  They are honest about their whiting fish and not just pass on tilapia as whiting as other seafood restaurants I‚Äôve visited in the past has done.  Their whiting fish is also filet as I want to enjoy my food and not have to worry about picking out the bones.  This location is not a dine in restaurant. You order you food and go.  The sides are also delicious, I‚Äôve had the baked macaroni and cheese, candied yams, collard greens, and corn bread.  They have a variety of items on their menu including desserts.  The restaurant is cash only.    If you don‚Äôt happen to have cash on you there is an ATM located inside.  The Restaurant is also accessible via public transportation.

originalText.text: Taste of seafood is the best I have ever had. Wherever I visited and I might have dabbled in some seafood, it has still fallen short of taste of seafood, even though it may have been awesome since I was a young fella and my mother brought tasty seafood home it has been the goat since that day, nothing has changed in all these years, and if you don‚Äôt believe me, give it a shot if it doesn‚Äôt meet your expectations or what this review suggest, email me and I‚Äôll owe you a meal.
